record.dc:title: Character Studies
record.dc:creator: Chalmers, Marjorie
record.dc:description: Scrapbook compiled by and lettered by Marjorie Chalmers, R. N. in 1941. Contains 12 photographs by Dorothy J. MacLean, P. S. Q. Several copies of the scrapbook were made and distributed among Pi Beta Phi Fraternity for Women chapters across the country. Promoted the work of the Pi Beta Phi Settlement School in Gatlinburg, Tennessee.
record.dc:subject: Handicraft

Pi Beta Phi Settlement School
Changing Mission of Pi Beta Phi Fraternity for Women in Gatlinburg, Tennessee, 1944-1964
